titles.title: Warren G. Magnuson Foundation and Margaret Chase Smith Foundation Assistance Act
A bill to provide financial assistance to the Warren G. Magnuson Foundation and the Margaret Chase Smith Foundation.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

bill.summary: 11/6/1987--Introduced. Warren G. Magnuson Foundation and Margaret Chase Smith Foundation Assistance Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to make grants to: (1) the Warren G. Magnuson Foundation, for the Warren G. Magnuson Health Services Center at the University of Washington in Seattle, Washington; and (2) the Margaret Chase Smith Foundation, for the Margaret Chase Smith Library Center in Skowhegan, Maine.
